resources.string:
On some random day, in a random cafe you see a bunch of nerdy guys who had lost their social life but with never ending thirst to create a better world, that would be us! 
 We, team of three losers, spent several nights surviving on a mug of coffee so that we could create a simple, reliable and materialistic railway info application just for you.
 When we started, we were discouraged that how could we provide a better solution completing with big players in the market. But we know a very simple and materialistic design can make us stand apart. 

 Jon Snow
 Bahubali
 Black Mamba
